links.*: Bilbo's Last Song (at the Grey Havens)
Cold be hand and heart and bone,
Farewell We Call to Hearth and Hall!
Hey dol! merry dol! ring a dong dillo!
Ho! Ho! Ho! To the Bottle I Go
O! Wanderers in the Shadowed Land
Seek for the Sword that was broken
Song of the Ent and Entwife
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
The Man in the Moon Stayed Up Too Late
When winter first begins to bite

wikitext.*:
==From the Books==
===[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]===
*[[Riddle of Strider|All that is Gold Does Not Glitter]]
*[[Seek for the Sword that was broken]]
*[[The Road Goes Ever On (song)|The Road Goes Ever On]] - ''a.k.a. The Old Walking song''
*[[Amroth#Amroth in Song|Song of Nimrodel]] - ''First Line: An Elven-maid there was of old''
*[[The Man in the Moon Stayed Up Too Late]] - ''First Line: There is an inn, a merry old inn''
*[[One Ring|Ring Verse]] - ''First Line: Three Rings for the Elven-kings under the sky''
*[[A Walking Song]] - ''First Line: Upon the hearth the fire is red''
*[[Snow-white! Snow-white! O Lady clear!]] - ''First Line: Snow-white! Snow-white! O Lady clear!''
*[[Ho! Ho! Ho! To the Bottle I Go]] - ''First Line: Ho! Ho! Ho! to the bottle I go''
*[[Bath-songs|Bath-song]] - ''First Line: Sing hey! for the bath at close of day''
*[[Farewell We Call to Hearth and Hall!]] - ''First Line: Farewell we call to hearth and hall!''
*[[O! Wanderers in the Shadowed Land|Song in the Woods]] - ''First Line: O! Wanderers in the shadowed land''
*[[Hey dol! merry dol! ring a dong dillo!|Tom Bombadil's songs]] - ''First Line: Hey dol! merry dol! ring a dong dillo''
:note- as in [[The Lord of the Rings]] songs index, all [[Tom Bombadil]]'s songs are treated as a continuation of the first one
*[[The Fall of Gil-galad]] - ''First Line: Gil-galad was an Elven-king''
*[[Song of Beren and Lúthien]] - ''First Line: The leaves were long, the grass was green''
*[[The Stone Troll]] - ''First Line: Troll sat alone on his seat of stone''
*[[Eärendillinwë]] - ''First Line: Eärendil was a mariner''
*[[When winter first begins to bite|Warning of Winter]] - ''First Line: When winter first begins to bite''
*[[Cold be hand and heart and bone,|Barrow-wight's incantation]] - ''First Line: Cold be hand and heart and bone''

===[[The Two Towers]]===
*[[Long List of the Ents]] - ''First Line: Learn now the lore of Living Creatures!''
*[[song of the Ent and Entwife]] - ''First Line: When spring unfolds the beechen leaf, and sap is in the bough''
*[[Bregalad's Song]] - ''First Line: O Orofarnë, Lassemista, Carnimírië!''
*[[Ra-hoom-rah!]] - ''First Line: We come, we come with roll of drum:''
*[[Galadriel's Messages]] - ''First Line: Where now are the Dúnedain, Elessar, Elessar?''
*[[Arise, arise, Riders of Theoden!|Call-to-Arms of the Rohirrim]] - ''First Line: Arise, arise, Riders of Théoden!''
*[[In Dwimordene, in Lórien]] - ''First Line: In Dwimordene, in Lórien''
*[[Lament for the Rohirrim]] - ''First Line: Where now the horse and the rider? Where is the horn that was blowing?''
*[[Oliphaunt (poem)|Oliphaunt]] - ''First Line: Grey as a mouse''

===[[The Return of the King]]===
*[[Malbeth|Malbeth the Seer's Words]] - ''First Line: Over the land there lies a long shadow''
*[[Athelas]] - ''First Line: When the [[Black Breath|black breath]] blows''

==From the Movies==
===[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|The Fellowship of the Ring]]===
*[[The Road Goes Ever On (song)|The Road Goes Ever On]]
*[[Ho! Ho! Ho! To the Bottle I Go#Portrayal in adaptations|A Drinking Song]] - ''First Line: To heal my heart and drown my woe''
*[[The Bath Song]] - ''First Line: Sweet is the sound of the falling rain''

===[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]===
*[[Bregalad's Song]] - ''First Line: O rowan mine, I saw you shine upon a summer's day''
*[[song of the Ent and Entwife]] - ''First Line: Beneath the roof of sleeping leaves the dreams of trees unfold''

===[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]===
*[[Riddle of Strider|All that is Gold Does Not Glitter]] - ''First Line: From the ashes a fire shall be woken''
*[[A Walking Song]] - ''First Line: Upon the hearth the fire is red,''
*[[Into the West]] - ''First Line: Lay down''
